decks.notes: This deck aims to quickly ramp up mana using Lotus Field and various other ramp cards to cast powerful spells like Emergent Ultimatum and Omniscience. It also includes control elements like Strict Proctor to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck focuses on combining cards to create powerful combos and overwhelm the opponent with big plays. The key strategy is to efficiently generate mana, control the board, and execute game-ending combos to secure victory.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly build a board presence with efficient creatures such as Bishop of Wings, Skyclave Apparition, and Righteous Valkyrie. Utilizing cards like Collected Company and Kayla's Reconstruction for card advantage and tempo plays, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creature attacks. The inclusion of mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves helps to ramp into higher costed threats like Resplendent Angel and Inspiring Overseer. With a mix of lifegain and pump effects, the deck looks to close out games swiftly and decisively.

This deck focuses on quickly emptying the opponent's hand and graveyard while generating value through sacrificing and recurring creatures. It utilizes cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Fatal Push to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Traverse the Ulvenwald helps to search for key creatures or lands, while cards like Scavenger's Talent and Dredger's Insight provide card advantage. Finish the opponent off with powerful threats like Ygra, Eater of All and overwhelm them with the deck's synergy and efficiency.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent by playing cheap and efficient creatures and spells. The deck aims to deal damage early and often, while also maintaining card advantage through card draw spells like Treasure Cruise. By leveraging the synergy between cheap spells and prowess creatures like Stormchaser's Talent and Vivi Ornitier, the deck can consistently put pressure on the opponent and close out games before the opponent can stabilize. Additionally, cards like Opt and Consider help the deck filter through its deck to find the necessary cards to execute its game plan.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push while maintaining a strong board presence through creatures like The Wandering Emperor and Blade of the Oni. Utilizing powerful removal spells like Vanishing Verse and Invasion of Gobakhan, as well as resilient threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, the deck aims to control the battlefield and push for victory. Strong mana base and versatile lands like Mutavault and Godless Shrine provide flexibility and consistency to the aggressive strategy. Wedding Announcement and Voice of Victory provide additional support for the deck's aggressive game plan.

The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent with small creatures and burn spells. It includes efficient removal options such as Lightning Strike and Reckless Rage to keep the opponent's board clear. The deck also utilizes aggressive creature abilities like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Emberheart Challenger to pressure the opponent. The inclusion of Manifold Mouse and Sunspire Lynx adds versatility and additional threats to the deck. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive game plan.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly bringing out aggressive creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Ygra, Eater of All, while using cards like Witch's Oven and Deadly Dispute to generate value and disrupt the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrupt Decay to handle threats, while cards like Trail of Crumbs and Dredger's Insight help with card advantage and ensuring a consistent stream of threats. Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER provides a powerful finisher option, while the mana base is carefully crafted to enable a smooth and consistent curve.

The concept of this deck is to aggressively cast spells and creatures to quickly fill the graveyard with Arclight Phoenixes. By casting spells like Consider, Opt, and Treasure Cruise to draw into more spells and fuel the Phoenixes, you can quickly bring them back from the graveyard and swarm your opponent. Cori-Steel Cutter helps to clear the way for your attacks, while cards like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe provide removal options. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with a barrage of spells and creatures to secure a fast victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays and dealing direct damage to the opponent quickly. It includes a mix of efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, along with creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Bonecrusher Giant to apply pressure. The deck also utilizes cards like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Screaming Nemesis to deal additional damage and finish off opponents. With a strong focus on speed and constant pressure, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of a few utility lands like Ramunap Ruins and Mutavault adds versatility to the deck's game plan.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress. It also has a strong removal package with cards like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. The deck utilizes powerful threats like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to close out the game quickly. The mana base is streamlined to support the aggressive game plan, with cards like Mutavault and Blightstep Pathway providing additional versatility. The deck aims to apply constant pressure and punish the opponent for any missteps.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy centered around Human creatures. By leveraging cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Thalia's Lieutenant, as well as Reflector Mage and Cecil, Dark Knight, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building a strong board presence. Cards like Inti, Seneschal of the Sun provide additional support and consistency to the deck. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and synergy, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.
